attributes.action: Allow crown estate tenants the right to mutual exchange
attributes.additional_details: Mr Osborne and Mr Cameron are promoting mutual exchange under the heading 'promoting mobility through mutual exchange ...realising the potential. See full information on the gov.uk website. But crown estate residents are unable to to do this. Even if you have exceptional circumstances... Housing law does not apply in regards to mutual exchanges and use of discretion... Sign this petition and let's have this changed so everyone can enjoy the benefits that the government are promoting
attributes.background: Stop discriminating against people and allow the mutual exchange for all crown estate tenants.
